This role requires signing a **strict NDA** due to the stealth-mode nature of the project and proprietary technology concepts.

Job Type: Full-time

Work Location: Remote

title: Product Design Lead
UX/UI Designer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

You are an experienced UX Designer with a strong background in learning, education, or other development platforms. You understand the unique challenges of designing large-scale learning environments and are skilled at creating digital experiences that are both impactful and scalable.

  

You’re a UX Designer with 5 years of experience, confident in your craft and eager to grow through collaboration and shared learning.


You have a strong grasp of user-centered design principles and know how to apply them to create intuitive, scalable digital tools.


You’re empathetic and curious, always seeking to understand the context and challenges of coworkers who use the tools you design.


You communicate clearly and confidently, advocating for the user and helping teams make informed design decisions.


You embrace feedback as a catalyst for improvement and contribute to a culture of open dialogue and continuous learning.


You’re skilled in wireframing, prototyping, and using design systems to create simple yet elegant User Interfaces, with proficiency in tools like Figma, Framer and Miro

 **Application deadline:** 04-12-2025

  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Automotive senior Interior lighting designer based on the west coast Sweden
description:
**ABOUT ENGAGE STUDIOS**


We design, innovate and build digital / physical products for the world's largest - and Sweden's smallest company. Our guiding principle is to make a difference - for the better. Ideas are good and execution is the success factor. We are people and teams who are not afraid to question, roll up our sleeves and laugh all the way to the finish line.


Since the start in 2009, we have worked with basically all manufacturing / developing companies in Sweden. The Volvo companies, IKEA, H&M, Electrolux, Lynk&Co, Zeekr, Houdini to name a few. Our customers are in the traditional Swedish industry all the way to innovative startups in Silicon Valley. They are not found in oil drilling or the military industry. We are determined to make our presence and work known with passionate and dedicated employees who love design, tech and people.

 **WE OFFER**


At Engage Studios, you will work in many different industries for different customers. You will work with incredibly smart and dedicated colleagues. Together we develop products and services that you can brag about to your friends. We at Engage Studios are always at the forefront of technology development. We develop and share knowledge with each other to get better tomorrow. With us, you get the opportunity to realize your dreams, big and small.

 **JOB DESCRIPTION**


Our clients seeks a highly skilled Senior interior Light Designer to join their Design Studio in Gothenburg. You will help define the interior lighting solution for their vehicles by conceiving, simulating, and prototyping advanced lighting concepts that merge brand identity, safety, and emotion. You will work within their Technology & Innovation department, collaborating with Interior Design, CMF, UX, and Engineering to deliver future-forward lighting implementation that meets regulatory and performance targets.

 **REQUIREMENTS**

* Bachelor’s degree or higher in Industrial/Product/Transportation Design, Interaction/Lighting Design, or similar.
* 5+ years of professional experience in interior automotive lighting design or closely related fields (consumer/architecture) with a strong portfolio.
* Proficiency with lighting design and visualisation tools (Blender & Adobe Creative Suite).
* Demonstrated experience translating light concepts into feasible, manufacturable solutions with suppliers and engineering.
* Excellent communication in English (both written and verbal), with strong storytelling and presentation skills.
* Hands‐on prototyping mindset; electrical/electronic basics and rapid prototyping skills are a plus.
* Knowledge of automotive lighting regulations and constraints is an advantage.

 **YOUR PROFILE**

* Create and deliver lighting concepts for interior systems (ambient, functional, and communication lighting).
* Develop lighting solutions that match the vehicle's design character and technical constraints, suggesting light integrations into the vehicle's form (surfaces, gaps, joints, materials).
* Translate brand DNA into iconic lighting signatures and dynamic behaviours (e.g.,


welcome/farewell, charging indication, Interior Light themes, ADAS-linked signals).  

* Use the lighting toolchain (visualisation, simulation, VR) to validate light effects, integration, and feasibility.
* Create and lead engaging presentations or prototypes that effectively convey intent to


stakeholders and suppliers.* Technically rigorous with an eye for refined aesthetics and brand character.
* Structured and methodical; able to plan, document, and drive issues to closure.
* Collaborative and clear communicator; comfortable leading technical reviews with


stakeholders and suppliers.  

* Proactive, hands‐on, and resourceful under time constraints.
* Independent and proactive with a high sense of responsibility.

 **MERITS**

* Experience with advanced interactive lighting technologies (OLED panels, AR overlays, projection/DLP, light pipes).
* Understanding of optics, light guides, materials, and human‐factors considerations in vehicle interiors.
* Experience working in or with automotive design studios and Tier‐1 suppliers.
* Experience with material/light interaction in interiors (UGR/glare analogues, luminance planning).

 **PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT**

Gothenburg

 **OTHER**

* The assignment will take place in their Gothenburg studio; they have an office‐first environment with some flexibility to WFH.
* Travel to China may be needed (approx. 1–2 trips per year).
* Fluent in English, spoken and written.
* A valid driver’s license is preferred.


Can start in Sweden with more than 1 month notice


If you are passionate about development, we want to hear from you. Please apply with your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications.

  

For questions regarding this position please contact hiring manager Susanne Lidén on susanne@engagestudios.com. Applications must be submitted through the official Career site.

title: Sr. Designer (UI/UX) | Remote | Full time
description:
**Senior Product & Marketing Designer (UI/UX)** 




**Location:** 
 REMOTE
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full-Time
 



**Overlap with US Eastern time zone for key meetings, but otherwise manage your own schedule** 




**Salary $3,500 - $5,500 USD/mo depending on experience** 




  





**About Upstack Data** 




  





 We are a rapidly growing B2B SaaS company providing marketing insights to e-commerce brands. We believe that exceptional design—both in our application and in our brand communication—is critical to our success and user satisfaction.
 



  





**The Role** 




 We are seeking an experienced and highly versatile Senior Designer to own the end-to-end visual and user experience across our core product and all marketing channels. This is a hybrid role requiring strong expertise in both modern UI/UX principles (for our web app) and compelling graphic design (for our B2B marketing presence).
 **A core responsibility will be ensuring a high-impact, consistent brand identity across all customer touchpoints.** 
 You will be the sole senior design voice, responsible for setting the standard for quality and brand consistency.
 



  





**What You Will Be Responsible For** 




**1. Product Design (UI/UX)** 



* **Application Design Ownership:** 
 Lead the complete UI/UX design process for our core B2B SaaS application, from wireframes and prototypes to final, pixel-perfect visual design.
* **Responsive Experience:** 
 Ensure the application interface is fully responsive and optimized for seamless use across desktop and mobile devices.
* **User-Centric Approach:** 
 Conduct user research, analyze feedback, and collaborate with Product Managers and Engineers to iterate on designs that solve complex user problems efficiently.
* **Design System Management:** 
 Define, maintain, and scale a component-based design system (e.g., in Figma) to ensure consistency and development velocity across the engineering team.



  





**2. Marketing & Brand Design** 



* **Marketing Website:** 
 Design and maintain a high-converting, responsive marketing website ([Your Company Domain]) that clearly communicates our value proposition to B2B clients.
* **Creative Assets:** 
 Design all marketing collateral, including digital ad creatives (display, social media), email graphics, social media content, and presentation decks.
* **Print Materials:** 
 Develop professional print materials such as brochures, event banners, and internal documents, ensuring they align perfectly with our digital branding.



  





**3. Brand Governance** 



* **Consistency Champion:** 
 Act as the primary guardian of our brand identity, ensuring a unified visual and tonal experience across the product, marketing, and all external communications.
* **Guidelines:** 
 Document and maintain comprehensive brand guidelines (visual and tone of voice) for internal and external use.



  




* **Required Qualifications**
* Thrives in 0→1 environments; balances vision with execution speed.
* 6+ years of professional design experience,
* 2+ years in a Senior or Lead capacity, ideally within a B2B SaaS environment.
* Deep proficiency in Figma for prototyping, component creation, and design handoff.
* Expert understanding of modern design principles, information architecture, and responsive design methodologies.
* Proven ability to work autonomously and communicate design rationale effectively to non-design stakeholders (Executives, Engineering, Sales).
* A strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in both complex UI/UX (SaaS product interfaces, not just marketing sites) and high-quality marketing creative.
* Expert at
 
 brand strategy and storytelling through design;
* Deep understanding of modern UX/UI principles, responsive design techniques, and accessibility best practices;
* Experience designing for landing pages, promotional website sections, and marketing campaigns;


- 


  





**How You'll Stand Out** 




  




* Portfolio demonstrating high-quality digital work (web design, social content, motion/animation, digital campaigns) with strong visual standards.
* AI proficiency (e.g., prompt engineering, workflow automation) in support of creative or operational output.
* Experience designing for onboarding flows, virality features, pricing pages, or subscription models.
* 
* Motion design skills (After Effects, Lottie, or similar);
* Strong illustration skills or unique hand-drawn visual style;
* Experience with prototyping and interaction design;
* Experience working with digital asset management systems.
* Experience working directly with Webflow (or similar no-code/low-code platforms) for marketing site implementation.
* Familiarity with motion graphics, basic video editing, or animation principles.
* Experience designing for data-intensive applications (dashboards, complex data visualization).


-

title: E-commerce Designer
description:
Acne Studios is a progressive luxury house and through collaboration and curiosity, we set high aspirations and strive for excellence. We value everyone’s contribution and embrace feedback to develop ourselves and others. We aim to minimise our environmental impact across all our operations and to address societal challenges in the way we conduct our business.
   

  

 As E-commerce Designer at our Stockholm HQ, you’ll ensure that acnestudios.com reflects our creative direction - delivering user-focused, conversion-driven design that supports the growth of our online store.
   

  

 CULTURE OF COLLABORATION
   

  

 We firmly believe that when you feel supported, included, and trusted, it enables you to enjoy your work and thrive in it. You will be a part of a team of colleagues with diverse roles and backgrounds, each with their unique skills and experiences.
   

  

 WHAT YOU WILL DO
   

  

 As E-commerce Designer you will play a key role in shaping the creative and functional expression of acnestudios.com, ensuring the brand’s identity is translated into exceptional digital experiences that balance creativity, usability, and commercial impact.
   

  

 Based at our Stockholm HQ, you’ll report to the Head of Digital Development & Design. You’ll be responsible for delivering digital experiences that reflect our brand, engage users, and support the growth of acnestudios.com. As E-commerce Designer, you will:
   

  

* Craft e-commerce experiences that balances brand expression, usability, and conversion
* Translate creative direction into consistent, on-brand digital design
* Support design decisions with insights, innovation, and best practices
* Stay hands-on in design and production
* Collaborate across teams to deliver seamless, high-impact solutions


 WHO YOU ARE
   

  

 You have high aspirations and focus on details that create substantial impact. You enjoy working as a team and you embrace feedback to develop yourself and others. You are curious and thrive in a dynamic environment. Cooperation, respect, and clear communication are important, along with your ambition to learn and grow. If these qualities speak to you, we would love to have you on our team.
   

  

 Specific personal qualities for this role:
   

  

* Collaborative and curious, with a proactive mindset
* Genuinely interested in fashion, design, and culture
* Driven by great user experiences and thoughtful design
* Comfortable working closely with cross-functional teams
* Open to feedback and eager to grow - individually and together


 Specific experience and knowledge for this role:
   

  

* Proven experience in digital and e-commerce design, backed by a strong portfolio
* Understanding of luxury branding and how it translates into engaging, user-focused digital experiences
* Hands-on design skills, with the ability to deliver consistent, high-quality work under tight deadlines
* Experience shaping design processes, workflows, or introducing new methodologies
* Proficient in Figma, with familiarity in AI-assisted design tools and modern e-commerce platforms
* Solid grasp of UX/UI principles, information architecture, and usability best practices
* Fluent in English, both written and spoken


**Please include a link to your portfolio showcasing relevant e-commerce and digital design work.**
 What matters most to us is not whether you master all the listed knowledge and skills. We are dedicated to recognising the potential in each individual. We embrace diversity of people as well as ideas and viewpoints and encourage everyone's individual expression of their own identity.
   

  

 We are reviewing applications on a rolling basis, so seize the opportunity to join us by submitting your application today!

title: UX Developer
description:
**UX DEVELOPER**
 Would you like to work in an international environment where you’ll make a difference every day? At Permobil, we’re looking for game-changers to join us as we innovate for individuals and develop the world’s most advanced assistive solutions.
   

  

 At
 **Permobil** 
 , the people who use our products come first. Our purpose is to create advanced assistive solutions that make the lives of adults and children living with disabilities more enriching. Our people are passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology to deliver innovations that improve lives. We are a sustainable and responsible business committed to continuous improvement, and our customers can trust us to provide market-leading solutions driven by insights-based clinical data.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 We are shaping the user experience for our AI agents by building interfaces that enable every employee to interact seamlessly with data and intelligence. As a
 **UX Developer** 
 , you will design and develop responsive, intuitive chat and dashboard experiences that combine the power of AI with the ease of modern digital interfaces. Collaborating closely with designers, Integration developers, and AI developers, you will help define the digital face of our internal AI ecosystem, ensuring our solutions are both engaging and user-friendly.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Build conversational UIs and dashboards using React, Next.js, and TypeScript,
* Integrate with Azure-hosted APIs and real-time LLM endpoints via REST or WebSockets,
* Develop secure authentication flows using MSAL.js or Entra ID,
* Collaborate with designers to deliver polished, accessible, and consistent user experiences,
* Create reusable UI components and contribute to our internal design system,
* Implement telemetry and feedback loops with Application Insights to improve UX and model responses.


**Qualifications & Skills**
* Master/Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or similar education,
* 3+ years of experience with React / Next.js and TypeScript,
* Strong knowledge of Azure App Services, Static Web Apps, or Power Pages,
* Proficiency in modern UI frameworks,
* Understanding of AI interaction design – chat UX, context windows, and user feedback loops,
* Familiarity with Microsoft Graph, Teams SDK, and integration into M365 experiences,
* Experience with GitHub or Azure DevOps CI/CD workflows,
* Experience in agile methodologies,
* Fluent in English; proficiency in Swedish is a plus.


**Meriting Skills**
* Experience embedding Azure OpenAI endpoints into front-end apps,
* Familiarity with UX research, motion design, or conversational interface patterns,
* Understanding of security best practices for data privacy and content rendering.


**Who are you?**
 You inspire and motivate those around you, while encouraging a collaborative spirit and clear communication with stakeholders at every level. You actively support experimentation, seeing each attempt as a chance to learn and improve. For you, failure is simply a stepping stone on the path to better solutions, and you help create an environment where curiosity and innovation thrive.
   

  

**Why is Permobil the next step for you?**
* You’ll make a difference. Every day. Everything we do leads to understanding and improving the lives of our users. Through our evidence-based innovation, we make a difference to people’s lives.
* You’ll make your mark as part of our future. We collaborate with colleagues across borders to Innovate for Individuals. The impact you make personally could lead change around the world.
* You’ll feel welcome from day one. We’re known for being great colleagues, who are collaborative, fun and at the cutting-edge. Everyone at Permobil cares as much as you do about making a positive difference.


**Application Process**
 We will conduct selection continuously so send us your application today or before
 **December 5th** 
 at the latest!
   

  

 Permobil is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We welcome applications from all qualified individuals.
   

  

 For more information about the position, please contact Christoffer Stigson, Director Digital Transformation, christoffer.stigson@permobil.com
   

  

 For information about the recruitment process, please contact Zivile Mitkute, Talent Acquisition Partner, zivile.mitkute@permobil.com
   

  

**Please respect that we do not wish recruitment assistance or advertising, we decline calls from recruitment and advertising providers.**
**More About Permobil**
 Permobil founder Dr. Per Uddén believed that helping people achieve the greatest level of independence is a basic human right and, for over 50 years, Permobil has held fast to that belief. Permobil is a global leader in advanced rehabilitation technology, passionate about better understanding our users’ needs and improving their quality of life through state-of-the-art healthcare solutions. Today, those solutions include power wheelchairs, seating and positioning products, power assist, and manual wheelchairs.
   

  

 Permobil is part of Patricia Industries, a subsidiary of Investor AB, and is headquartered in Sweden. Permobil has 2 000 team members in 18 countries around the world. For more information regarding the company’s storied history and complete product line, visit permobil.com.

title: LXD - Learning Experience Designer - AI x EdTech (Full remote - French fluent 🇫🇷)
description:
**⚠️ If you’re looking for a regular Learning Design job, stop reading here.**
**This Isn’t Another LXD Job.**
**It’s the chance to redefine what learning feels like :** 
 to craft the experiences inside the OS for Human Greatness Augmented with AI.
   

  

**Science-backed. Design-led. AI-powered. Global.**
 At Paradox, we’re building a
 **new category** 
 :
   

  

 An ecosystem that fuses
 *neuroscience, design, AI,* 
 and
 *behavioral transformation*
 so that people don’t just consume knowledge, but
 *rewire who they are.*
 You’ll be designing
 **experiences, not lessons.**
**Deep inside you are looking for a new adventure with…**
* 🚀Ambition : Smart Team mates driven to create an iconic international product
* 🔥Impact : you strive for making a real difference in the company growth, and not be a number in a big organization
* 😍Mission : knowing your greatness left a mark in people lives, through technology and behavioral science


**At Paradox, we are convinced that greatness is trainable.**
**That’s why** 
 we want to empower people at scale, by leveraging cutting edge technologies like AI, and crafting user experiences with outstanding aesthetics.
   

  

 We do that by merging :
   

  

* Human Intelligence (coaches, peers, and mentors)
* Structured Intelligence (protocols, mental models, rituals),
* Technological Intelligence (AI personalization, feedback loops, adaptive journeys)


 To create one seamless ecosystem:
 **Paradox OS** 
 .
   

  

 Your mission is to turn this ecosystem into
 **beautifully orchestrated learning arcs** 
 that feel alive, cinematic, and deeply human.
   

  

**This is why we are looking for a LXD to make Paradox a category-defining global brand loved for its learning experiences.**
 This is a full time position from our beautiful offices in Dubai, Paris or Lisbon or remotely anywhere in the world.
   

  

**OUR BELIEFS**
 We believe self-help is broken.
   

  

 Most learning platforms are used the same way : consuming generic theories, getting quick highs, ending with no real change.
   

  

 At
 **Paradox** 
 , we believe people deserve more.
   

  

 More than content. More than motivation.
   

  

 They deserve a
 **system that knows them** 
 , one that adapts, challenges, and grows with them.
   

  

 At Paradox,
 **learning = transformation.**
 We believe that technology can do more than entertain or save time. It can
 **translate insight into transformation** 
 , through
 **AI personalization, lean experimentation, and deep psychological understanding** 
 .
   

  

 Because learning shouldn’t just make you feel inspired for a day, it should
 **change how you live, think, and create.**
**OUR VISION**
 At Paradox, we want to re-invent how people grow.
   

  

 We do not build another course or coaching app but the Operating System for Greatness.
   

  

 Founded by David Laroche, a creator followed by over 2 million people and known for his interviews with icons like Tony Parker, Mike Horn, Richard Branson, and Gad Elmaleh, Paradox aims to build something that will live beyond any individual (including its founder), for decades to come.
   

  

 Our ambition is to compete with players like Mindvalley (150M ARR), but with a sharper vision, grounded protocols for achievers, people who want more for their life, refusing mediocrity.
   

  

 To do that, we bring together designers, tech, coaches, and filmmakers to create learning experiences that are cinematic, precise, and effective.
   

  

 We move fast, aim high, and hold ourselves to the standards of Apple, Spotify, and MasterClass. No fluff, focused on meaningful impact.
   

  

 Get obsessed with transforming our clients’ lives, treat it like a science, build, measure, improve
   

  

 and let those transformations
 *be our* 
 marketing.
   

  

 While others hide their numbers, we want to let our results speak loudly for us.
   

  

**YOUR MISSION 🚀**
 As our Learning Experience Designer, you’ll bridge
 **psychology, storytelling, and product design** 
 to craft experiences that make people say:
   

  

 “This didn’t just teach me, it
 *changed me.* 
 ”
   

  

 Each cycle you lead will integrate:
   

  

* Protocols : guided frameworks that rewire perception, emotion, and action.
* Loops : adaptive, AI-powered coaching cycles that evolve with each user.
* Personalization : experiences that feel uniquely theirs, every time.
* AI agents : Specialised agents that enhance the student journey with the right actionable insights.


**🎯 YOUR 4 MAIN MISSIONS**
* Learning Experience Architecture - Owns the full learning system, from architecture to execution
* Design the journey, not just the content and lesson.
* Script learning experiences that engage both heart and brain: Each word, exercise, and soundscape must serve transformation, not just knowledge.
* Ensure every feature supports the evolution of the Paradox ecosystem: Loops, PX Agents, Protocols, Membership.
* Craft a premium, high-impact course experience
* Craft new courses with experts.
* Co-craft courses with top performers, translating their genius into cinematic, science-based learning journeys.
* Lead the end-to-end design of the course, from initial strategy to final content delivery.
* Own scripting, copywriting, and the creation of educational assets (e.g., learning modules, assessments, reflection prompts, supplemental materials).
* Conduct desk and user research to inform course goals, learner personas, and curriculum structure.
* Craft AI Conversations and Loops
* Write and optimize prompt chains, refine tone and flow until every exchange feels human and transformative.
* Review conversations with AI to refine the agents.
* Analyze, Measure, Iterate for Transformation and Stickiness
* Define KPIs of transformation (not just completion).
* Iterate on the course using learner data, feedback, and performance metrics.
* Be obsessed with user problems : talk to users weekly, analyze patterns, and identify where transformation breaks.
* Apply principles from habit formation, self-determination theory, and behavioral triggers to drive daily practice and retention.


**THE IDEAL CANDIDATE 😍**
**Experience :**
* 3–6 years as in Learning Design, Instructional Design, or Experience Design (EdTech, Coaching, or Transformational Education preferred).
* You’ve shipped at least one major feature or product end-to-end, and can show measurable results.
* Comfortable with AI tools, Figma.
* Proven track record of designing and delivering digital learning experiences across a variety of asset types (e.g. video, written articles, assessments, interactive experiences, etc.).
* Portfolio of one or more “cinematic / narrative-rich” courses or learning programs (e.g. not just corporate training, but premium courses).


**Traits :**
* Craft-obsessed: You get things done, you love to work much beyond 9-5, you have a doer mentality, a bias for outcomes and want to be a beast in your field.
* Strong writing skills: You’re a strong editorial thinker with experience producing high-quality content for external audiences.
* Strong aesthetic sensibility: You care how the course “feels”.
* User and Impact Obsessed: You think in outcomes, not outputs, you care about transformation.
* Critical Thinker: You can turn a vague problem into a clear hypothesis, You can challenge your own assumptions, break models, and rebuild them grounded in real data, field insights, and lived experience.
* Digital and AI savvy: You’re able to build AI Agents (if not, you demonstrate ability to learn while applying).


**Language**
**French** 
 : native
   

  

**English** 
 : Fluent English, you can hold a conversation on specific details with English-speaking colleagues.
   

  

 Our chosen language for written communication is English.
   

  

**IT MIGHT NOT BE FOR YOU**
 Until you’ve felt what a perfect loop, prompt, or emotional shift sounds like, you can’t systematize it.
   

  

 The early versions of PX Agents and Loops are language-sensitive.
   

  

 The difference between “What did you feel?” and “What are you feeling?” changes the user’s emotional state.
   

  

 That requires someone who rewrites lines several times, not someone who just optimizes the spreadsheet.
   

  

 If you think it’s overthinking, this won’t fit.
   

  

 ❌ If you want to design a program on a subject like Critical Thinking, Negotiation without reading four of the best books on it, this is not for you.
   

  

 ❌ If you need clarity before chaos, wrong place.
   

  

 ❌ If you prefer balance over intensity, wrong season.
   

  

 ❌Surface-level Vision Alignment
 **:** 
 you like the idea of Paradox but doesn’t want to
 *get* 
 the depth. Paradox is design-led; you must
 *touch the product* 
 , not just manage it.
   

  

**WHY JOIN US ❤️**
 Because we’re not just teaching people.
   

  

 You’ll join a collective of
 **filmmakers, designers, psychologists, and engineers**
 who believe
 *greatness is trainable* 
 and that learning should feel like art.
   

  

 Build a product that fuses
 **neuroscience, design, and AI** 
 to reinvent how humans grow.
   

  

 The chance to build a product that could redefine human potential.
   

  

 Work with filmmakers, psychologists, engineers, and creatives obsessed with impact.
   

  

 In the heart of our headquarters stands the
 **100 000 Dreams Wall** 
 ,
   

  

 Every photo on that wall is a life rewritten:
   

  

 “I ran a marathon.”
   

  

 “I started my company.”
   

  

 “I found peace with my father.”
   

  

 You will
 **play a crucial role in the development of an Iconic company**
 Currently, our videos have been viewed over 100 million times.
   

  

***Growth and Ambition***
* > 🏅Being surrounded by A-players who strive to perform


***Competitive Salary***
*But you don’t just want a competitive paycheck, you also want…*
***Impact and Meaning***
* > Playing a crucial role in the development of a company whose content and products will be used by millions of people
* > Waking up in the morning feeling like you are making a difference is something!


*We receive messages every day from clients who have successfully lost weight, quit smoking, reach a milestone in their business, built better relationships, and made positive changes in their lives.*
* > ❤️ Contributing to the Paradox Foundation (our non-profit), dedicated to empower teenagers


***But that's not all, we believe that driven people deserve…***
***Freedom and Well Being 🗽***
* > 😎A company culture based on autonomy and accountability
* > 🗽Flexible working hours
* > 🌎A remote culture from day one with the freedom to work from wherever you want
* > 🏤Magnificent office in Dubai, Paris, Lisbon - it feels like home :)
* > 🧍‍♀️Standing desks paid by the company if you live far from our offices
* > 💻Work on Mac, for us it counts :)
* > 🏀350€ per year paid by the company to take care of yourself ( for your gym, or dance class or whatever make you feel great)
* > 📚150€ of books or education - At Paradox, we are learner lovers and we want to support you in that
* > 🔥6 1:1coachings - A Paradox Coach supporting you on anything personal or professional, we want you to live your best life


**How To Apply 📃**
 ⚠️ To complete the recruitment process,
 **each candidate must organize calls with his or her previous managers. If you are not comfortable with this : do not apply** 
 ⚠️
   

  

 If all this sounds good to you, come and write the next chapter with us
 **🚀🚀🚀🚀**
**HIRING PROCESS 📃**
- 

 That job description resonated with you?
   

  

**Here is your tailor made hiring process**
**📃 A 6 to 8 minutes** 
 application survey (with a short video assignment)
   

  

**💻 A 30mn video call** 
 to deep dive into your career path and ambitions
   

  

**💻 A 1h video call** 
 to discuss how you'd fit into Paradox’s Product team
   

  

**💻 A 1h culture-fit video call** 
 to assess alignment with our values and mindset
   

  

**💻 A final video call** 
 to discuss Product Vision and the next milestones to build
   

  

**💼 Reference check** 
 to understand how you operate across environments and help set you up for a smooth onboarding
   

  

**🫵🚀 Welcome aboard!**
**About Our Hiring Process**
 Our recruitment process is tailored to do our best to avoid that you or us realize that we’re not a perfect fit. Every step serves a purpose and will allow us to get to know you better as much as it’ll help you understand more where you’ll be stepping in.
   

  

 We also want you to have time to ask all of your questions regarding the mission, the long-term vision of your team and the company, our values, with the relevant interlocutor in front of you.
   

  

 If you believe what we believe: that learning should feel cinematic, alive, and transformative, this isn’t a career move.
   

  

 It’s your next masterpiece.
   

  

 Welcome to
 **Paradox.**
 Let’s build the Operating System for Greatness.

title: Webbredaktör
description:
Vill du skapa och utveckla digitalt innehåll som gör skillnad på riktigt? Brinner du för att göra det enkelt för både interna och externa målgrupper att hitta rätt information? Vill du arbeta i en organisation som stärker svensk konkurrenskraft, främjar innovation och bidrar till en hållbar framtid? Varmt välkommen till oss på Svenska institutet för standarder!
 



  





**Ditt uppdrag som webbredaktör** 




 Som webbredaktör på Svenska institutet för standarder ansvarar du för att planera, skapa och publicera innehåll som visar värdet av standarder och gör det enkelt för våra målgrupper att hitta rätt. Du arbetar nära kollegor inom kommunikation, marknad, produkt och digital utveckling genom att bidra vid innehållsplanering, marknadsaktiviteter och interna projekt.
 



  





 Du arbetar bland annat med att:
 


* Planera och utveckla texter, bilder och film till externa och interna kanaler.
* Publicera och optimera innehåll och struktur på sis.se och andra digitala plattformar.
* Följa upp och analysera trafik och användarbeteenden.
* Utbilda och stötta nya och befintliga redaktörer i organisationen i våra webbverktyg och arbetssätt.
* Publicera och strukturera SIS filmer och interaktiva webbutbildningar på relevanta plattformar samt skapa landningssidor för olika erbjudanden.



  





**Din kompetens** 




 Vi tror att du är en digitalt nyfiken person med en god känsla för språk, struktur och användbarhet. Du är van att arbeta med webbinnehåll ur både ett redaktionellt och ett affärsmässigt perspektiv.
 



  





 Vi ser gärna att du har:
 


* Erfarenhet som webbredaktör, content manager eller liknande.
* Mycket god förmåga att skriva olika texter.
* Erfarenhet av CMS-verktygen Episerver/Optimizely och Storyblok.
* Förståelse för UX, tillgänglighet och digitala kundresor.
* Erfarenhet av Google Analytics/GA4, Hubspot och Figma.
* Meriterande om du har kunskap om bild- och videoredigering, tex i Adobe-sviten
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med utbildningsmaterial eller e-learning.



  





 Som person är du strukturerad, initiativtagande och samarbetsorienterad – och du trivs med att hjälpa andra lyckas i sina roller.
 



  





**Att arbeta hos oss** 




 Svenska institutet för standarder, är en kunskapsorganisation. Hos oss är du del av en unik verksamhet, där Sveriges främsta experter samlas för att ta fram de bästa lösningarna – standarder – ofta tillsammans med motsvarande kompetenser från hela världen. Hos oss får du ta del av världsomspännande projekt, som i sin tur öppnar dörrar till internationella nätverk. Svenska institutet för standarder har bidragit till att stärka svensk konkurrenskraft i mer än ett sekel. På senare tid har vi fått stor uppmärksamhet för vår möjlighet att ta fram lösningar för många av dagens utmaningar – i allt från fossilfritt stål och plastförpackningar till biologisk mångfald och cirkulär ekonomi.
 



  





 Vårt arbete utgår ifrån våra värderingar omtanke, tillit och professionalism. Som medarbetare erbjuds du fina anställningsförmåner, läs gärna mer på sis.se. SIS är en arbetsplats som eftersträvar mångfald. Vi vill ha medarbetare med olika bakgrund, erfarenhet och perspektiv eftersom vi vet att det berikar arbetsmiljön och stärker SIS verksamhet.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag eller senast 2025-12-12! Vi arbetar löpande med urvalet och rekryteringen kan komma att avslutas innan sista ansökningsdag. Vi använder tester som en del av urvalsprocessen och tillämpar sex månaders provanställning. Vid frågor, välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Victoria Waltari Nyberg, 070-4962351.

title: Business Controller
description:
At BMW Group, everything starts with passion. It turns a profession into a vocation. It drives us to keep reinventing mobility and bring innovative ideas onto the roads. Enthusiasm for joint projects turns a team into a strong unit where every opinion is valued. It is only when expertise, highly professional processes and enjoyment of work unite that we can shape the future together.
 



  





 As a Business Controller, you will be responsible for steering one of the 5 markets in terms of: Contribution Margin, Cost of Retail and overall result. Providing to the management and market stakeholders periodical analysis of performance with analytical deep dive to gain market insights and look for additional opportunities in a profit/volume-oriented way. Additionally leading a strategic function within the matrix structure of the team.
 



  





**What awaits you?** 



* Become center of the business steering and controls: establish granular reports, find opportunities, solve challenges.
* Work in tight collaboration within the team: thanks to matrix structure every single member is connected and supporting each other as one, especially during monthly closings, forecasts and budget processes.
* Stay always connected to business partners: sales and volume planning, SF, product, dealer development will be your main counterparts - successful communication is the key.
* Collaborate with headquarters in terms of standards, processes and central requirements.
* Maintain best quality of planning and actuals reporting for dedicated area of responsibility, communicate with auditors on top to market stakeholders and management.



  





**What should you bring along?** 



* Degree in economics and understanding of financials KPIs.
* Several years of experience within finance position.
* Analytical skills and willingness to crunch data.
* Proactive approach, future-oriented mindset.
* SAP user experience is a plus.
* Advanced excel skills.
* Excellent English skills for international communication.



  





**To succeed in this role, we believe you are:** 



* Curious, driven by desire for more.
* Self-driven, but also be able to work under pressure.
* Attentive to details and have good overall precision.
* Open and ready for extensive communication and collaboration with others.



  





**What you can look forward to?** 




 Whatever your heart’s desire – in the BMW Group, you will find a wide range of departments and disciplines across the world where you can share your professional passion with us. As a BMW employee, everyone gets the opportunity to drive their own BMW or MINI on favorable terms.
 



  





 This is a permanent position located in modern facilities in Sollentuna and you will be reporting to the Head of Controlling. As a BMW employee, everyone gets the opportunity to drive their own BMW or MINI on favorable terms. If you find this interesting and you’re bringing the right mind-set in combination with a good skill set, please don’t hesitate to apply to the position.
 



  





 The job post will remain open until December 11, and applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis.

title: Frontendutvecklare
description:
Jobba för originalet.
   

  

 Välkommen till Apoteket, nummer ett sedan 1971. Med visioner för framtiden och kvalitet i varje detalj, skapar vi förutsättningar för ett liv i hälsa. Hos oss utvecklas du i en kultur där din röst alltid blir hörd. Och allt vi får över ger vi tillbaka till samhället. Det är så vi gör skillnad på riktigt.
   

  

 Om Digital Experience & Development
   

  

 På vår Tech-avdelning tror vi på att sätta människan i centrum – både våra kunder och våra medarbetare.
   

  

 I våra tvärfunktionella team ges alla möjlighet att ta initiativ och driva fram nya utvecklingsidéer, från idé till produktion.
   

  

 Inom Digital Experience & Development skapar vi och vidareutvecklar Apotekets digitala kundmöten – som apoteket.se, appen och de flöden som kopplar ihop e-handel och fysisk butik.
   

  

 Här samarbetar produktägare, UX-designers, frontend- och backendutvecklare för att skapa en trygg, enkel och personlig upplevelse.
   

  

 Vårt mål är att göra det lättare för människor att ta hand om sin hälsa – varje dag.
   

  

 Din roll
   

  

 Som Frontendutvecklare hos Apoteket blir du en nyckelperson i vårt arbete med att förbättra och optimera kundupplevelsen på apoteket.se och i vår mobilapp.
   

  

 Du kommer arbeta nära verksamheten och Apotekets kärnaffär, där din kompetens får en direkt påverkan på både kundupplevelse och affärsresultat.
   

  

 Här ser du tydligt effekten av det du utvecklar – de lösningar du bygger bidrar till ökad försäljning, optimerade flöden och en bättre digital kundresa.
   

  

 I rollen kombinerar du tekniskt hantverk med affärsförståelse, och får möjlighet att använda data och iterativa-tester för att driva konkreta, mätbara förbättringar som gör skillnad för både kunder och verksamhet.
   

  

 Du ingår i ett av våra agila team inom Digital Experience & Development som arbetar med områden som checkout, betalflöden, produktsök och produktvisning.
   

  

 Du kommer ingå i ett utvecklingsteam med produktägare, UX-designer, frontend- och backendutvecklare samt testare.
   

  

 Vad du kommer göra hos oss:
   

  

* Bygga och optimera användargränssnitt i React.js / TypeScript och React Native.
* Utveckla och implementera A/B-tester
* Skriva enhetstester och arbeta strukturerat med Git och Gitflow
* Samarbeta med UX-designers, produktägare, analytiker och backendutvecklare i ett agilt team.
* Delta i utveckling och drift i Azure och andra molnbaserade miljöer.


**Vem söker vi?**
 Vi söker dig som är självgående, nyfiken och gillar att se tydliga resultat av ditt arbete.
   

  

 Du har flera års erfarenhet som frontendutvecklare och trivs i en miljö där teknik och kundinsikter möts.
   

  

 Du tycker det är roligt att bidra till verksamhetens utveckling, driva experiment och optimera för bästa kundupplevelse.
   

  

* Du har relevant akademisk utbildning, eftergymnasial YH eller motsvarande kunskap.
* Du har erfarenhet av att använda react.js.
* Du har erfarenhet av att utveckla React Native-applikationer, med fokus på att rendera webbinnehåll genom webviews och integrera native-funktionalitet.
* Du har erfarenhet av experimentell och iterativ utveckling.
* Du har förståelse för tredjepartsramverk (AB Tasty, Voyado eller liknande).
* Du har erfarenhet av att implementera mätning i kod för analysverktyg som Google Analytics och ContentSquare.


**Vi erbjuder...**
* Friskvårdsbidrag: 5000 kr per år.
* Personalrabatt: Förmånliga priser på många av våra produkter.
* Flexibla helgdagar: Möjlighet att byta arbetsfria helgdagar mot andra dagar på året.
* Förmånsportal (Benify): Erbjudanden inom bland annat kollektivtrafik, leasingbil, gym och hälsobehandlingar.
* Trygga försäkringar: Förstärkt föräldrapenning, tjänstepension (ITP) och kompletterande försäkringar.


**Om oss**
 Apoteket grundades 1971 och ägs av svenska staten, vilket innebär att vi arbetar både ansvarsfullt och långsiktigt. Vårt viktiga samhällsuppdrag handlar om att förbättra människors hälsa, läkemedelsanvändning och bidra till ökad patientsäkerhet. Med omkring 400 apotek och 3000 medarbetare över hela landet har vi nära samarbete med hälso- och sjukvården – alltid med omtanke om både människor och miljö.
   

  

 Vårt mål är tydligt: Ett liv i hälsa, för alla.
   

  

  

**Praktisk information:**
 Nyfiken? Det räcker gott.
   

  

 Hör av dig om rollen fångar ditt intresse! Vi berättar gärna mer om tjänsten och vår verksamhet – så du får en tydligare bild och kan avgöra om det känns helt rätt. Vänta bara inte för länge, urval och intervju sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum.
   

  

 Skicka ditt CV tillsammans med svar på våra urvalsfrågor. Du behöver inte skriva ett personligt brev – frågorna är utformade för att hjälpa oss förstå mer om dina erfarenheter och kompetenser för matchning mot tjänst.
   

  

 Vi använder tester för objektivt urval som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess. Provanställning tillämpas.
   

  

 Välkommen till Apoteket!

title: Coach (passioné pédagogie) - AI x EdTech (Full remote - French fluent 🇫🇷)
description:
**It’s the chance to redefine what learning feels like :** 
 to craft the experiences inside the OS for Human Greatness Augmented with AI.
   

  

**Science-backed. Design-led. AI-powered. Global.**
 At Paradox, we’re building a
 **new category** 
 :
   

  

 An ecosystem that fuses
 *neuroscience, design, AI,* 
 and
 *behavioral transformation*
 so that people don’t just consume knowledge, but
 *rewire who they are.*
 You’ll be designing
 **experiences, not lessons.**
**Deep inside you are looking for a new adventure with…**
* 🚀Ambition : Smart Team mates driven to create an iconic international product
* 🔥Impact : you strive for making a real difference in the company growth, and not be a number in a big organization
* 😍Mission : knowing your greatness left a mark in people lives, through technology and behavioral science


**At Paradox, we are convinced that greatness is trainable.**
**That’s why** 
 we want to empower people at scale, by leveraging cutting edge technologies like AI, and crafting user experiences with outstanding aesthetics.
   

  

 We do that by merging :
   

  

* Human Intelligence (coaches, peers, and mentors)
* Structured Intelligence (protocols, mental models, rituals),
* Technological Intelligence (AI personalization, feedback loops, adaptive journeys)


 To create one seamless ecosystem:
 **Paradox OS** 
 .
   

  

 Your mission is to turn this ecosystem into
 **beautifully orchestrated learning arcs** 
 that feel alive, cinematic, and deeply human.
   

  

**This is why we are looking for a Learning Designer to make Paradox a category-defining global brand loved for its learning experiences.**
 This is a full time position from our beautiful offices in Dubai, Paris or Lisbon or remotely anywhere in the world.
   

  

**OUR BELIEFS**
 We believe self-help is broken.
   

  

 Most learning platforms are used the same way : consuming generic theories, getting quick highs, ending with no real change.
   

  

 At
 **Paradox** 
 , we believe people deserve more.
   

  

 More than content. More than motivation.
   

  

 They deserve a
 **system that knows them** 
 , one that adapts, challenges, and grows with them.
   

  

 At Paradox,
 **learning = transformation.**
 We believe that technology can do more than entertain or save time. It can
 **translate insight into transformation** 
 , through
 **AI personalization, lean experimentation, and deep psychological understanding** 
 .
   

  

 Because learning shouldn’t just make you feel inspired for a day, it should
 **change how you live, think, and create.**
**OUR VISION**
 At Paradox, we want to re-invent how people grow.
   

  

 We do not build another course or coaching app but the Operating System for Greatness.
   

  

 Founded by David Laroche, a creator followed by over 2 million people and known for his interviews with icons like Tony Parker, Mike Horn, Richard Branson, and Gad Elmaleh, Paradox aims to build something that will live beyond any individual (including its founder), for decades to come.
   

  

 Our ambition is to compete with players like Mindvalley (150M ARR), but with a sharper vision, grounded protocols for achievers, people who want more for their life, refusing mediocrity.
   

  

 To do that, we bring together designers, tech, coaches, and filmmakers to create learning experiences that are cinematic, precise, and effective.
   

  

 We move fast, aim high, and hold ourselves to the standards of Apple, Spotify, and MasterClass. No fluff, focused on meaningful impact.
   

  

 Get obsessed with transforming our clients’ lives, treat it like a science, build, measure, improve
   

  

 and let those transformations
 *be our* 
 marketing.
   

  

 While others hide their numbers, we want to let our results speak loudly for us.
   

  

**YOUR MISSION 🚀**
 As our Learning Experience Designer, you’ll bridge
 **psychology, storytelling, and product design** 
 to craft experiences that make people say:
   

  

 “This didn’t just teach me, it
 *changed me.* 
 ”
   

  

 Each cycle you lead will integrate:
   

  

* Protocols : guided frameworks that rewire perception, emotion, and action.
* Loops : adaptive, AI-powered coaching cycles that evolve with each user.
* Personalization : experiences that feel uniquely theirs, every time.
* AI agents : Specialised agents that enhance the student journey with the right actionable insights.


**🎯 YOUR 4 MAIN MISSIONS**
* Learning Experience Architecture - Owns the full learning system, from architecture to execution
* Design the journey, not just the content and lesson.
* Script learning experiences that engage both heart and brain: Each word, exercise, and soundscape must serve transformation, not just knowledge.
* Ensure every feature supports the evolution of the Paradox ecosystem: Loops, PX Agents, Protocols, Membership.
* Craft a premium, high-impact course experience
* Craft new courses with experts.
* Co-craft courses with top performers, translating their genius into cinematic, science-based learning journeys.
* Lead the end-to-end design of the course, from initial strategy to final content delivery.
* Own scripting, copywriting, and the creation of educational assets (e.g., learning modules, assessments, reflection prompts, supplemental materials).
* Conduct desk and user research to inform course goals, learner personas, and curriculum structure.
* Craft AI Conversations and Loops
* Write and optimize prompt chains, refine tone and flow until every exchange feels human and transformative.
* Review conversations with AI to refine the agents.
* Analyze, Measure, Iterate for Transformation and Stickiness
* Define KPIs of transformation (not just completion).
* Iterate on the course using learner data, feedback, and performance metrics.
* Be obsessed with user problems : talk to users weekly, analyze patterns, and identify where transformation breaks.
* Apply principles from habit formation, self-determination theory, and behavioral triggers to drive daily practice and retention.


**THE IDEAL CANDIDATE 😍**
**Experience :**
* 3–6 years as in Learning Design, Instructional Design, or Experience Design (EdTech, Coaching, or Transformational Education preferred).
* You’ve shipped at least one major feature or product end-to-end, and can show measurable results.
* Comfortable with AI tools, Figma.
* Proven track record of designing and delivering digital learning experiences across a variety of asset types (e.g. video, written articles, assessments, interactive experiences, etc.).
* Portfolio of one or more “cinematic / narrative-rich” courses or learning programs (e.g. not just corporate training, but premium courses).


**Traits :**
* Craft-obsessed: You get things done, you love to work much beyond 9-5, you have a doer mentality, a bias for outcomes and want to be a beast in your field.
* Strong writing skills: You’re a strong editorial thinker with experience producing high-quality content for external audiences.
* Strong aesthetic sensibility: You care how the course “feels”.
* User and Impact Obsessed: You think in outcomes, not outputs, you care about transformation.
* Critical Thinker: You can turn a vague problem into a clear hypothesis, You can challenge your own assumptions, break models, and rebuild them grounded in real data, field insights, and lived experience.
* Digital and AI savvy: You’re able to build AI Agents (if not, you demonstrate ability to learn while applying).


**Language**
**French** 
 : native
   

  

**English** 
 : Fluent English, you can hold a conversation on specific details with English-speaking colleagues.
   

  

 Our chosen language for written communication is English.
   

  

**IT MIGHT NOT BE FOR YOU**
 Until you’ve felt what a perfect loop, prompt, or emotional shift sounds like, you can’t systematize it.
   

  

 The early versions of PX Agents and Loops are language-sensitive.
   

  

 The difference between “What did you feel?” and “What are you feeling?” changes the user’s emotional state.
   

  

 That requires someone who rewrites lines several times, not someone who just optimizes the spreadsheet.
   

  

 If you think it’s overthinking, this won’t fit.
   

  

 ❌ If you want to design a program on a subject like Critical Thinking, Negotiation without reading four of the best books on it, this is not for you.
   

  

 ❌ If you need clarity before chaos, wrong place.
   

  

 ❌ If you prefer balance over intensity, wrong season.
   

  

 ❌Surface-level Vision Alignment
 **:** 
 you like the idea of Paradox but doesn’t want to
 *get* 
 the depth. Paradox is design-led; you must
 *touch the product* 
 , not just manage it.
   

  

**WHY JOIN US ❤️**
 Because we’re not just teaching people.
   

  

 You’ll join a collective of
 **filmmakers, designers, psychologists, and engineers**
 who believe
 *greatness is trainable* 
 and that learning should feel like art.
   

  

 Build a product that fuses
 **neuroscience, design, and AI** 
 to reinvent how humans grow.
   

  

 The chance to build a product that could redefine human potential.
   

  

 Work with filmmakers, psychologists, engineers, and creatives obsessed with impact.
   

  

 In the heart of our headquarters stands the
 **100 000 Dreams Wall** 
 ,
   

  

 Every photo on that wall is a life rewritten:
   

  

 “I ran a marathon.”
   

  

 “I started my company.”
   

  

 “I found peace with my father.”
   

  

 You will
 **play a crucial role in the development of an Iconic company**
 Currently, our videos have been viewed over 100 million times.
   

  

***Growth and Ambition***
* > 🏅Being surrounded by A-players who strive to perform


***Competitive Salary***
*But you don’t just want a competitive paycheck, you also want…*
***Impact and Meaning***
* > Playing a crucial role in the development of a company whose content and products will be used by millions of people
* > Waking up in the morning feeling like you are making a difference is something!


*We receive messages every day from clients who have successfully lost weight, quit smoking, reach a milestone in their business, built better relationships, and made positive changes in their lives.*
* > ❤️ Contributing to the Paradox Foundation (our non-profit), dedicated to empower teenagers


***But that's not all, we believe that driven people deserve…***
***Freedom and Well Being 🗽***
* > 😎A company culture based on autonomy and accountability
* > 🗽Flexible working hours
* > 🌎A remote culture from day one with the freedom to work from wherever you want
* > 🏤Magnificent office in Dubai, Paris, Lisbon - it feels like home :)
* > 🧍‍♀️Standing desks paid by the company if you live far from our offices
* > 💻Work on Mac, for us it counts :)
* > 🏀350€ per year paid by the company to take care of yourself ( for your gym, or dance class or whatever make you feel great)
* > 📚150€ of books or education - At Paradox, we are learner lovers and we want to support you in that
* > 🔥6 1:1coachings - A Paradox Coach supporting you on anything personal or professional, we want you to live your best life


**How To Apply 📃**
 ⚠️ To complete the recruitment process,
 **each candidate must organize calls with his or her previous managers. If you are not comfortable with this : do not apply** 
 ⚠️
   

  

 If all this sounds good to you, come and write the next chapter with us
 **🚀🚀🚀🚀**
**HIRING PROCESS 📃**
- 

 That job description resonated with you?
   

  

**Here is your tailor made hiring process**
**📃 A 6 to 8 minutes** 
 application survey (with a short video assignment)
   

  

**💻 A 30mn video call** 
 to deep dive into your career path and ambitions
   

  

**💻 A 1h video call** 
 to discuss how you'd fit into Paradox’s Product team
   

  

**💻 A 1h culture-fit video call** 
 to assess alignment with our values and mindset
   

  

**💻 A final video call** 
 to discuss Product Vision and the next milestones to build
   

  

**💼 Reference check** 
 to understand how you operate across environments and help set you up for a smooth onboarding
   

  

**🫵🚀 Welcome aboard!**
**About Our Hiring Process**
 Our recruitment process is tailored to do our best to avoid that you or us realize that we’re not a perfect fit. Every step serves a purpose and will allow us to get to know you better as much as it’ll help you understand more where you’ll be stepping in.
   

  

 We also want you to have time to ask all of your questions regarding the mission, the long-term vision of your team and the company, our values, with the relevant interlocutor in front of you.
   

  

 If you believe what we believe: that learning should feel cinematic, alive, and transformative, this isn’t a career move.
   

  

 It’s your next masterpiece.
   

  

 Welcome to
 **Paradox.**
 Let’s build the Operating System for Greatness.

title: Product Manager Mobile Top-Up
description:
*Global migration is a 21st-century reality. Whether people are fleeing from something or racing towards better opportunity, following love or seeking new experiences, more and more are living in different environments and in new ways. We celebrate the power of people coming together. That’s why we connect ambitious people abroad with their families and friends back home so they can support each other emotionally and financially, and lead more enriched lives.* 




  





**Why Rebtel?** 




 When you join Rebtel, you become part of a global team, bringing together diverse minds from every corner of the world. Our headquarter is nestled in Stockholm and here we strike a balance between dedicated work and more relaxed activities. Every Friday the unmistakable aroma of freshly popped popcorn fills the air, but our celebrations encompass everything from minor and major common accomplishments to cinnamon bun day.
 



  





**What will you do?** 




 As a Product Manager for Mobile Top-Up, you’ll define the future of how customers recharge and stay connected. You’ll balance customer insights, market dynamics, and business targets, crafting a product that delivers both value and revenue impact.
 



  





**Responsibilities And Tasks** 



* Define and drive the product vision, strategy, and roadmap for mobile top-up.
* Coordinate with finance and growth to shape and test pricing and packaging strategies (e.g., fees, bundles, margins) to balance customer value with business goals.
* Ensure a world-class user experience for storefront, purchase, confirmation, and balance management.
* Use customer research, analytics, and market insights to prioritize improvements and new features.



  





**Requirements** 



* Have 5+ years’ PM experience in consumer apps, preferably in the fintech space.
* Proven experience working with data to drive decisions.
* Have hands-on experience with pricing or monetization experiments.
* Want to shape a high-impact product that touches millions of users globally.
* Experience from A/B testing and experimentation frameworks.
* Comfort working in a fast-paced, high-volume transactional environment.
* Familiarity with digital payments, cross-border transactions, or remittances.
* Previous experience from cross border payments is a plus
* Experience building loyalty driving experiences such as subscriptions, loyalty programs is a plus.



  





**Our Offer To You** 




  





**Benefits** 




 At Rebtel, you are the most important asset and we strive to provide a comprehensive package of benefits and perks that enhance your well-being and work experience. Here are some of the things you can expect from us:
 


* Pension Plan
* Health Checkups and Private Medical Insurance
* 10k Bucket (net) for wellness allowance and Travel (benefit taxed)
* Discount on gym memberships
* Bonus program
* Parental pay
* 30 days annual vacation
* Relocation Support, if you're joining us from afar, we'll assist you in making a smooth transition.



  





 Rebtel is an international workplace, and at the office, we speak English; therefore, high English proficiency is required.
 



  





*We are Rebtel. We come from all around the world to create products for anyone who has crossed a border. We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*

title: Industry Business Analyst
description:
To strengthen our development organization, we’re looking for a strategic and industry-savvy Business Analyst with hands-on knowledge from sectors such as Fashion, Food & Beverage, Distribution, Discrete or Process Manufacturing, This is an excellent opportunity for someone who understands ERP from both a business and technology perspective—and is ready to make an impact at the core of product innovation.
   

 This role also offers an exciting path for those who’ve worked closely with ERP solutions in customer or consulting settings and are ready to contribute directly to product development.
   

  

 Your Role:
   

 As an Industry Business Analyst, you’ll represent the voice of the industry inside Product Development. Working in close partnership with the Industry Product Manager, you’ll help shape the product roadmap and ensure that features are developed in alignment with real-world industry needs.
   

 You’ll act as Product Owner in agile teams, clarify requirements, define use cases, and ensure development output remains industry-relevant and customer-centric. You’ll also lead or participate in select customer engagements to gather insights that directly inform our product strategy.
   

 This is a key role where your industry knowledge, structured thinking, and communication skills will bridge the gap between market needs and development execution.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities:
   

 •Serve as an industry expert within Product Development
   

 •Contribute to roadmap preparation through research and industry analysis, taking the road map into development plan
   

 •Break down complex business problems into clear, actionable requirements
   

 •Capture, document, and prioritize use cases and features
   

 •Define high-level solution designs aligned with industry standards
   

 •Own and manage the product backlog in agile teams
   

 •Act as a customer advocate in development discussions
   

 •Stay current on Infor technologies and industry trends
   

 •Support innovation initiatives around GenAI/ML with Industry competence and use cases
   

 •Create Industry use cases for content, like Widgets, Process Catalogs, Persona based Workspaces and Composite Applications
   

  

 Who You Are:
   

 •Industry experience in Fashion, Food & Beverage, Distribution, Discrete or Process Manufacturing
   

 •Knowledge of Infor M3 would be valued and/or ERP implementation experience
   

 •Skilled at analyzing business needs and translating them into technical solutions
   

 •Effective communicator, both in writing and in presentations
   

 •Experienced working in customer-facing roles
   

 •Self-motivated with strong time management and problem-solving skills
   

 •Comfortable balancing business insight with technical depth
   

 •Fluent in Swedish and English - speaking and writing
   

  

 If you have experience working closely with ERP solutions—particularly within consulting or as key user within the relevant Industries, this could be the ideal next step in your career. Join us in shaping the future of industry-driven software.
   

  

 About Infor
   

  

 Infor is where ambition meets impact. Join a global community of bold thinkers and innovators, where your expertise doesn’t just solve problems. it shapes industries, unlocks opportunities, and creates real-world impact for billions of people. At Infor, you’re not just building a career. you’re helping to build what’s next.
   

  

 Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.
   

  

 For more information visit [1] www.infor.com
   

  

  

 References
   

  

 Visible links
   

 1. https://www.infor.com/
   

  

 Our Values
   

  

 At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called [1] Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization.
   

  

 We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM™. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.
   

  

 Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the [2] FAQ section.
   

  

 Fraud Awareness
   

  

 We have been made aware of unauthorized individuals posing as Infor recruiters, including some who have made fraudulent offers of employment. Please read our [3] guidelines and protect yourself from recruitment scams.
   

  

 Fraud Privacy Policy
   

  

 We value your privacy at Infor. You may access our privacy policy [4] here.
   

  

  

 References
   

  

 Visible links
   

 1. http://https//www.kochind.com/about/business-philosophy
   

 2. https://www.infor.com/about/careers/faq
   

 3. https://dam.infor.com/api/public/content/b45f298e1ab44b84ac898d759b2c21f7?v=3994f5e9
   

 4. https://www.infor.com/about/privacy

title: Funktionsledare Customer Interface Development - Marginalen Bank
description:
*Har du erfarenhet av att leda utveckling inom digitala kundplattformar, tror du att en relativt liten bank kan utmana de hetaste bankapparna i världen, har du en tydlig vision för plattformar, tror du på ett modernt agilt ledarskap? Då ser vi gärna att du läser vidare…* 




  





**Om rollen:** 




 Som ledare för Customer Interface Development leder du de team som arbetar med att utveckla front-end lösningar med fokus på mobil- och internetbanken och kundportaler. Du arbetar nära såväl affärsverksamheten som UX samt övriga funktioner inom Tech och rapporterar till chefen för funktionsområdet Development and Operations.
 



  





**Ett urval av dina kommande arbetsuppgifter…** 



* Personalansvar vilket bland annat innebär att arbeta med teamens mål, utveckling, lönesättning och rekrytering
* Leda teamen som utvecklar front-end för våra digitala kundplattformar
* Strategiskt ansvarig för våra digitala kundplattformar
* Stödja Tech ledning med kompetens inom digitala kanaler
* Teknisk vision för en långsiktiga och skalbara digitala kundplattformar
* Vision kring dagliga releaser
* Leda förvalta och vidareutveckling av de digitala kundplattformar
* Ansvarig för kontinuitetsplaner och riskanalyser
* Engagera och marknadsföra digitala kanaler internt
* Vara en medlem i Techs ledningsgrupp



  





**Vem du är…** 




 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet kring utveckling av digitala plattformar - webb och appar. Du har flerårig erfarenhet inom området och är van att arbeta strategiskt inom området. Det är starkt meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att leda utvecklingen av digitala kundplattformar inom bank eller fintech. Vi ser gärna att du har en högskoleexamen inom webb/informationsteknik eller motsvarande. Du är van att använda svenska och engelska som arbetsspråk och uttrycker dig väl både i tal och skrift på såväl svenska som engelska.
 



  





 Du är en person med stark integritet, målmedvetenhet och förmåga att ta initiativ. Du är van att se helheten och att prioritera. Du har sedan tidigare haft personalansvar och som ledare prioriterar du coaching och tillgänglighet framför ett detaljdrivet ledarskap.
 



  





**Vad marginalen erbjuder dig…** 




 Hos oss blir du en del av en prestigelös organisation, där du får vara med och påverka processer och rutiner. Vi arbetar agilt och vågar fatta så många beslut som möjligt så nära en själv och ens team som möjligt. Vi är innovativa, arbetar proaktivt och driver igenom fattade beslut med handlingskraft.
 



  





 Vårt huvudkontor, mitt i centrala Stockholm, huserar i byggnaden Grönlandet - ett arkitektoniskt mästerverk signerat Sigurd Lewerentz från 1932. Vi har en egen restaurang med egen kock som lagar ekologisk mat, vilket är en extra lyx i vår vardag!
 



  





 Här får du arbeta med medarbetare som känner stolthet, arbetsglädje och delaktighet. Vi erbjuder också utveckling och flexibilitet för alla våra engagerade medarbetare. Volontärdag, tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag och hälsoförsäkring är bara några av våra förmåner - Välkommen att läsa mer om vår kultur och våra förmåner på vår hemsida.
 



  





*Vid eventuella frågor och ansökan kontakta rekryterande ledare Michael Almgren på mail michael.almgren@marginalen.se. Då urvalsprocessen sker löpande är du varmt välkommen med din ansökan så snart som möjligt.*

title: Integration Developer
description:
**INTEGRATION DEVELOPER**
 Would you like to work in an international environment where you’ll make a difference every day? At Permobil, we’re looking for game-changers to join us as we innovate for individuals and develop the world’s most advanced assistive solutions.
   

  

 At
 **Permobil** 
 , the people who use our products come first. Our purpose is to create advanced assistive solutions that make the lives of adults and children living with disabilities more enriching. Our people are passionate about pushing the boundaries of technology to deliver innovations that improve lives. We are a sustainable and responsible business committed to continuous improvement, and our customers can trust us to provide market-leading solutions driven by insights-based clinical data.
   

  

**Position Overview**
 As an
 **Integration Developer** 
 at Permobil, you will serve as the vital link between our business systems and the AI platform. You will design and maintain secure, scalable connectors that integrate our large language model (LLM) services with key tools such as Dynamics 365, SharePoint Online, Teams, Fabric, and Power Platform, enabling truly actionable AI across the organization. If you thrive on solving complex data and API challenges within Microsoft’s cloud ecosystem, this role places you at the heart of innovation and digital transformation.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and build robust integrations between Azure AI services and enterprise systems (CRM, HR, ERP, IoT),
* Create reusable APIs, plugins, and Power Automate connectors to let agents execute business workflows,
* Develop logic apps, webhooks, and middleware using Azure Functions, API Management, and Service Bus,
* Implement secure data access using Managed Identities, Entra ID, and role-based access control,
* Monitor integration performance with Azure Monitor, Application Insights, and Log Analytics,
* Work closely with Python and UX teams to expose function-calling endpoints for AI functions.


**Qualifications & Skills**
* Master/Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or similar education,
* 4+ years of experience with Azure integration services (API Management, Logic Apps, Functions, Service Bus),
* Proficiency in C#, Python, or Node.js for backend/middleware development,
* Hands-on experience with Microsoft Graph API, Dynamics 365 APIs, or SharePoint REST APIs,
* Familiarity with Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps) for workflow automation,
* Solid understanding of REST / GraphQL API standards, authentication, and data security,
* Experience in enterprise system integration and change management,
* Experience in agile methodologies,
* Fluent in English; proficiency in Swedish is a plus.


**Meriting Skills**
* Experience with LangChain Tool Calling or OpenAI function calling patterns,
* Knowledge of event-driven architectures and Event Grid,
* Familiarity with Azure DevOps Pipelines and GitOps workflows.


**Who are you?**
 You inspire and motivate those around you, building strong collaboration and clear communication with stakeholders at every level. You actively encourage experimentation, viewing each new attempt as an opportunity for growth. You understand that failure is a stepping stone to success, helping to create an environment where curiosity, learning, and innovation are always encouraged.
   

  

**Why is Permobil the next step for you?**
* You’ll make a difference. Every day. Everything we do leads to understanding and improving the lives of our users. Through our evidence-based innovation, we make a difference to people’s lives.
* You’ll make your mark as part of our future. We collaborate with colleagues across borders to Innovate for Individuals. The impact you make personally could lead change around the world.
* You’ll feel welcome from day one. We’re known for being great colleagues, who are collaborative, fun and at the cutting-edge. Everyone at Permobil cares as much as you do about making a positive difference.


**Application Process**
 We will conduct selection continuously so send us your application today or before
 **December 5th** 
 at the latest!
   

  

 Permobil is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. We welcome applications from all qualified individuals.
   

  

 For more information about the position, please contact Christoffer Stigson, Director Digital Transformation, christoffer.stigson@permobil.com
   

  

 For information about the recruitment process, please contact Zivile Mitkute, Talent Acquisition Partner, zivile.mitkute@permobil.com
   

  

**Please respect that we do not wish recruitment assistance or advertising, we decline calls from recruitment and advertising providers.**
**More About Permobil**
 Permobil founder Dr. Per Uddén believed that helping people achieve the greatest level of independence is a basic human right and, for over 50 years, Permobil has held fast to that belief. Permobil is a global leader in advanced rehabilitation technology, passionate about better understanding our users’ needs and improving their quality of life through state-of-the-art healthcare solutions. Today, those solutions include power wheelchairs, seating and positioning products, power assist, and manual wheelchairs.
   

  

 Permobil is part of Patricia Industries, a subsidiary of Investor AB, and is headquartered in Sweden. Permobil has 2 000 team members in 18 countries around the world. For more information regarding the company’s storied history and complete product line, visit permobil.com.

title: IT-Supporttekniker
description:
**Plats:** Stockholm
  
**Anställningsform:** Heltid
  
**Tillträde:** Efter överenskommelse
  
Om tjänsten
  
Arbetsgivaren söker en IT-supporttekniker för att utföra rutinmässigt användarstöd samt grundläggande hantering av företagets servermiljöer. Arbetsuppgifterna genomförs i enlighet med fastställda processer, policydokument och instruktioner. Tjänsten omfattar både administrativa och tekniska moment av förutsägbar karaktär.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
Arbetet består huvudsakligen av följande återkommande uppgifter:
  
Registrering, kategorisering och uppföljning av supportärenden.
